strings.str: You deposit tax document can be used to claim VAT deduction for the deposit received.
VAT liability is payable by the recipient of our services. Pursuant to section 10 of Value Added tax act, the place of taxable supply is abroad
We have issued an invoice payable by you for the services provided (Contract on Cooperation Within the Registration of Domain Names)
Domain name registration (RREG code), domain name record maintenance (RUDR code) - in multiples of years (Number) for domain names
VAT has been settled through deposit tax documents

str.name: department of the civil law agenda

strings.str: Registered in the registry of legal entity interest
associations of the Municipal Council of Prague

str.name: The CZ.NIC z.s.p.o. company, an administrator...

strings.str: The CZ.NIC z.s.p.o. company, an administrator of the national .cz domain, hereby informs you that so far he has not been instructed to renew the registration of your domain name specified above. This domain is currently out of service and excluded from .cz zone (see the Instructions for registration in .cz domain located at www.nic.cz).

str.name: Should you be interested in keeping this domain name...

strings.str: Should you be interested in keeping this domain name for a further period, please promptly contact the appropriate registrar, confer with him over the complaints, if any, and make further arrangements. You are also free to turn to a different designated registrar and entrust him with the registration extension. See also www.nic.cz for an update list of the companies having a contract with CZ NIC association that enables them to act as a registrar.

str.name: hould the registration of the domain name...

strings.str: Should the registration of the domain name not be extended in time, the registration shall be terminated on the

str.name: and the domain name shall be open...

strings.str: and the domain name shall be open to other interested persons!
